summary: After his entire department is outsourced, an American novelty products salesman (Hamilton) heads to India to train his replacement.
cast: Josh Hamilton|Matt Smith|Rudolf Rodrigues|Jaineeraj Rajpurohit|Siddarth Jadhav|Asif Basra|Sudha Shivpuri|Raghu Mama|Parvati|Sitaram D. Kadam|Feroz|Raja Kadale|Harish Chandra|Prashant Mahesh|Ayesha Dharker|Bhuvnesh Shetty|Jeneva Talwar|Saurabh Agarwal|Darshan Singh|Larry Pine|Ketan Mehta|Depesh Shah|Urmi Mukherjee|Divya Ranganath|Bharat Sarjerao Adhangle|Sheikh Noor Islaam|Aflatun B. Irani|Vhitabhai|Arjun Mathur|Shriti Tyagi
title: Outsourced
